column17: R1 20mph over bridge 292 (115m 09ch) R2 20mph over bridge 296 (116m 18ch) R3 Double Heading prohibited R4 If a locomotive fails north of Invergordon, the authority of the Infrastructure Manager's Structures Engineer must be obtained before an assisting locomotive is permitted to proceed towards the failed train 30mph at the following locations: 31m 900yds to 31m 1200yds 41m 00yds to 41m 100yds 42m 500yds to 42m 700yds 50m 500yds to 50m 700yds 51m 700yds to 51m 880yds 52m 1320yds to 52m 1600yds 59m 200yds to 59m 320yds 74m 1300yds to 74m 1500yds 75m 880yds to 75m 1000yds 79m 400yds to 79m 500yds 80m 500yds to 80m 700yds 81m 1650yds to 82m 50yds 82m 100yds to 82m 250yds 83m 1400yds to 83m 1600yds 84m 300yds to 84m 500yds 88m 1320yds to 88m 1600yds 90m 1450yds to 90m 1500yds 91m 500yds to 91m 700yds 92m 500yds to 92m 1100yds 94m 800yds to 95m 00yds 96m 600yds to 96m 900yds 96m 1700yds to 97m 300yds 98m 300yds to 98m 500yds 99m 200yds to 99m 500yds 100m 1200yds to 101m 400yds 102m 100yds to 102m 200yds 104m 1600yds to 105m 00yds 105m 800yds to 105m 1600yds 109m 1000yds to 109m 1320yds 111m 1100yds to 111m 1400yds 115m 100yds to 115m 300yds 115m 900yds to 115m 1100yds 117m 500yds to 117m 700yds 117m 1200yds to 117m 1500yds 118m 400yds to 118m 700yds
